description: Get information about an OpsItem by using the ID. You must have permission in Identity and Access Management (IAM) to view information about an OpsItem. For more information, see Set up OpsCenter in the Amazon Web Services Systems Manager User Guide. Operations engineers and IT professionals use Amazon Web Services Systems Manager OpsCenter to view, investigate, and remediate operational issues impacting the performance and health of their Amazon Web Services resources. For more information, see Amazon Web Services Systems Manager OpsCenter in the Amazon Web Services Systems Manager User Guide.

parameters.name: OpsItemId
parameters.description: The ID of the OpsItem that you want to get.

nested_items.name: CreatedBy
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Amazon Web Services account that created the OpsItem.

nested_items.name: OpsItemType
nested_items.description: The type of OpsItem. Systems Manager supports the following types of OpsItems:
/aws/issue This type of OpsItem is used for default OpsItems created by OpsCenter.
/aws/changerequest This type of OpsItem is used by Change Manager for reviewing and approving or rejecting change requests.
/aws/insight This type of OpsItem is used by OpsCenter for aggregating and reporting on duplicate OpsItems.

nested_items.name: CreatedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the OpsItem was created.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The OpsItem description.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedBy
nested_items.description: The ARN of the Amazon Web Services account that last updated the OpsItem.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: The date and time the OpsItem was last updated.

nested_items.name: Notifications
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic where notifications are sent when this OpsItem is edited or changed.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Amazon Simple Notification Service (Amazon SNS) topic where notifications are sent when this OpsItem is edited or changed.

nested_items.name: Priority
nested_items.description: The importance of this OpsItem in relation to other OpsItems in the system.

nested_items.name: RelatedOpsItems
nested_items.description: One or more OpsItems that share something in common with the current OpsItem. For example, related OpsItems can include OpsItems with similar error messages, impacted resources, or statuses for the impacted resource.

nested_items.name: OpsItemId
nested_items.description: The ID of an OpsItem related to the current OpsItem.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The OpsItem status. For more information, see Editing OpsItem details in the Amazon Web Services Systems Manager User Guide.

nested_items.name: OpsItemId
nested_items.description: The ID of the OpsItem.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version of this OpsItem. Each time the OpsItem is edited the version number increments by one.

nested_items.name: Title
nested_items.description: A short heading that describes the nature of the OpsItem and the impacted resource.

nested_items.name: Source
nested_items.description: The origin of the OpsItem, such as Amazon EC2 or Systems Manager. The impacted resource is a subset of source.

nested_items.name: OperationalData
nested_items.description: Operational data is custom data that provides useful reference details about the OpsItem. For example, you can specify log files, error strings, license keys, troubleshooting tips, or other relevant data. You enter operational data as key-value pairs. The key has a maximum length of 128 characters. The value has a maximum size of 20 KB.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: (string) ---

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the OperationalData key.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of key-value pair. Valid types include SearchableString and String.

nested_items.name: Category
nested_items.description: An OpsItem category. Category options include: Availability, Cost, Performance, Recovery, Security.

nested_items.name: Severity
nested_items.description: The severity of the OpsItem. Severity options range from 1 to 4.

nested_items.name: ActualStartTime
nested_items.description: The time a runbook workflow started. Currently reported only for the OpsItem type /aws/changerequest.

nested_items.name: ActualEndTime
nested_items.description: The time a runbook workflow ended. Currently reported only for the OpsItem type /aws/changerequest.

nested_items.name: PlannedStartTime
nested_items.description: The time specified in a change request for a runbook workflow to start. Currently supported only for the OpsItem type /aws/changerequest.

nested_items.name: PlannedEndTime
nested_items.description: The time specified in a change request for a runbook workflow to end. Currently supported only for the OpsItem type /aws/changerequest.

nested_items.name: OpsItemArn
nested_items.description: The OpsItem Amazon Resource Name (ARN).
